DOC.brief_summary: Current influenza vaccine reduce efficacy elderly . This study investigate immunogenicity , safety tolerability adjuvanted influenza vaccine elderly participant .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 2 Study Immunogenicity , Safety Tolerability CSL412 Elderly Participants
DOC.criteria: Aged ≥ 18 ≤ 45 OR ≥ 60 Ability provide prevaccination venous blood sample History clinically significant medical condition Immunomodulative therapy Acute infection
